indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: No coordinating body exists and/or nascent governance structure for digital health is constituted on a case-by-case basis.

indicators.name: Digital Health prioritized at the national level through planning
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is digital health included and budgeted for in national health or relevant national strategies and/or plan(s)? Note: The focus of this indicator is on the inclusion of digital health or eHealth in the national health strategy.
indicators.scoreDescription: Digital health is not included in the national health strategy. It is being implemented in an ad hoc fashion in health programs.

indicators.name: National eHealth/ Digital Health Strategy or Framework
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have an eHealth or digital health strategy or framework and a costed digital health plan?
indicators.scoreDescription: There is no digital health strategy or framework. Draft digital health strategy or framework developed, but not officially reviewed.

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure master patient index of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure birth registry of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure death registry of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?

indicators.name: Digital health prioritized at the national level through dedicated bodies / mechanisms for governance
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have a separate department / agency / national working group for digital health?
indicators.scoreDescription: No coordinating body exists and/or nascent governance structure for digital health is constituted on a case-by-case basis.

indicators.name: Digital Health prioritized at the national level through planning
indicators.indicatorDescription: Is digital health included and budgeted for in national health or relevant national strategies and/or plan(s)? Note: The focus of this indicator is on the inclusion of digital health or eHealth in the national health strategy.
indicators.scoreDescription: Digital health is not included in the national health strategy. It is being implemented in an ad hoc fashion in health programs.

indicators.name: National eHealth/ Digital Health Strategy or Framework
indicators.indicatorDescription: Does the country have an eHealth or digital health strategy or framework and a costed digital health plan?
indicators.scoreDescription: There is no digital health strategy or framework. Draft digital health strategy or framework developed, but not officially reviewed.

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure master patient index of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?
indicators.scoreDescription: A master patient index exists, is available and in active use and includes >75% of the relevant population. The data is available, used, and curated. Strategies are being implemented to include 100% of the population.

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure birth registry of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?
indicators.scoreDescription: A secure birth registry exists, is available and in active use and includes >75% of the relevant population. The data is available, used, and curated. Strategies are being implemented to include 100% of the population.

indicators.name: Digital identity management of individuals for health
indicators.indicatorDescription: Specifically, is there a secure death registry of uniquely identifiable individuals available, accessible and current for use for health-related purposes?
indicators.scoreDescription: A secure death registry exists, is available and in active use and includes >75% of the relevant population. The data is available, used, and curated. Strategies are being implemented to include 100% of the population.
